Name: [Affinity] Nitro-Fuel Feast
Desc: Burnice has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Extra at No Additional Charge]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo.
Desc2: In Burnice's world, solving problems is simple... Gather some good friends from the squad and have a lively Nitro-Fuel Feast together!
